com.orientechnologies.common.concur.resource

Class OSharedResourceAdaptiveExternal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orientechnologies.common.concur.resource.OSharedResourceAdaptive
      • com.orientechnologies.common.concur.resource.OSharedResourceAdaptiveExternal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OSharedResource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OLuceneIndexEngineAbstract

    public class OSharedResourceAdaptiveExternal
extends OSharedResourceAdaptive
implements OSharedResource
    Optimize locks since they are enabled only when the engine runs in MULTI-THREADS mode.
    Author:
    Luca Garulli (l.garulli--(at)--orientdb.com)
